mapper.select: select s.store_id storeId, s.manager_staff_id managerStaffId, st.staff_id staffId, st.first_name firstName, st.last_name lastName, a.address_id addressId, a.address address, a.district district, a.city_id cityId, a.postal_code postalCode, a.phone phone from store s left join staff st on s.manager_staff_id = st.staff_id left join address a on s.address_id = a.address_id where s.manager_staff_id is not null
